resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104154</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104154</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206448</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">In Congress Assembled: Continuity and Change in the Governing of the United States</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Im Kongreß Zusammengebaut: Durchgang und 
Änderung in der Regelung der Vereinigten Staaten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans Le Congrès Rassemblé : Continuité et 
changement de régir des Etats-Unis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">No Congress Montado: Continuidade e mudança 
em governar dos estados unidos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Nel Congresso Montato: La continuità ed il 
cambiamento nel governare del unito Dichiara</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στο συνέδριο που συγκεντρώνεται: Συνοχή και 
αλλαγή κυβερνώ των Ηνωμένων Πολιτειών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En El Congreso Ensamblado: Continuidad y 
cambio en gobernar de los Estados Unidos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">provides lesson plans on the Constitution, Bill of Rights, issues that confronted the first Congress, and broadsides from the Continental Congress calling for special days of thanksgiving and remembrance.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stellt Lektionpläne auf der Beschaffenheit, 
Verfassung, Ausgaben, die den ersten Kongreß konfrontierten, und 
broadsides vom kontinentalen Kongreß zur Verfügung, der für 
spezielle Tage von Thanksgiving und von Erinnerung benennt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fournit des plans de leçon sur la constitution, 
déclaration des droits, les issues qui ont confronté le premier 
congrès, et par le travers du congrès continental appelant pendant des 
jours spéciaux de thanksgiving et de souvenir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fornece plantas da lição no constitution, na 
conta de direitas, nas edições que confrontaram o primeiro congress,
e nos broadsides do congress continental que chama-se por dias 
especiais de thanksgiving e de remembrance.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fornisce i programmi di lezione sulla 
costituzione, sulla fattura dei diritti, sulle edizioni che hanno 
confrontato il primo congresso e sugli attacchi dal congresso 
continentale che chiama per i giorni speciali thanksgiving e del 
remembrance.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρέχει τα σχέδια μαθήματος για το σύνταγμα, Bill 
των δικαιωμάτων, ζητήματα που αντιμετώπισαν το πρώτο συνέδριο, 
και broadsides από το ηπειρωτικό συνέδριο που απαιτεί τις 
ειδικές ημέρες της ημέρας των ευχαριστιών και της ενθύμησης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">proporciona a planes de la lección en la 
constitución, la cuenta de las derechas, las ediciones que 
enfrentaron a primer congreso, y los costados del congreso 
continental que llama por días especiales de thanksgiving y del 
remembrance.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206448</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104154</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/in-congress-assembled-continuity-and-change-in-the-governing-of-the-united-states</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
